# upper_limb_gt3x_prosthesis

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `upper_limb_gt3x_prosthesis` is to map out an analysis plan for open-source conversion of Raw GT3X+ files into a full analysis.  The output is hosted at https://johnmuschelli.com/upper_limb_gt3x_prosthesis/.

All data is from https://springernature.figshare.com/collections/Upper_limb_activity_of_twenty_myoelectric_prosthesis_users_and_twenty_healthy_anatomically_intact_adults_/4457855.  The data was released using CC0 licensing.
